Reviews.Title: “relatively average hotel, but convenient, clean & quiet”

Reviews.Content: hotel essentially expected money berlin actually price fair pay little hotel cant expect beautiful topquality stay looking clean quiet change times hallway wifi free signal strong stay connected smoking didnt reek terrifically pure smelling overall slept beds comfortable internet reliable recommend hotel purposes

Reviews.Title: “Best week ever”

Reviews.Content: daughter stayed week wonderful week hotel helpful friendly feel family food lovely service excellent hotel placed ideal close taxis cafes kudamm bothered noise day night enjoyed stay cant wait return

Reviews.Title: “Quite good, but not great”

Reviews.Content: stayed whilst business jan 1 free internet bonus hotels berlin offer wife spent hours trying ones 2 plenty space size fold couch relaxing day berlin 3 supermarket day priced amazing pastries selection fruit breakfast bad 1 dated bit reminiscent 80s decor bit tired 2 english tv channels watch tv spending day round trade bit tv help 3 coffeetea plugin coffee supplied overall average stay job nice free internet location bit updating nice

Reviews.Title: “Sound hotel with some glitches”

Reviews.Content: hotel situated near savigny platz sbahn kudamm stayed five days size reasonably appointed minor irritations cup sizes coffee close power boil kettle major issue wifi reliable lift service poor reduced reception log bringing ipad breakfast bathroom acceptable absence bar soap irritate fashioned shower curtain road activity noise audible intrusive breakfast fine quality quantity

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 times time 6 nights hotel near main streets town kudam bus lines spacious tastefully furnished perfectly clean air conditioner properly safe minibar breakfast varied rich adjacent hotel supermarket note especially excellent service provided front desk clerk called tries opportunity help care stay hotel pleasant comfortable patient asset hotel travel berlin twice continue visit excellent hotel
